headline: Jim Cramer: Cigna (CI) Is in His Crosshairs – “The Easiest Spot” in Health Insurance
summary: We recently published a list of Jim Cramer is Bullish on These 10 Stocks. In this article, we are going to take a look at where The Cigna Group (NYSE:CI) stands against other stocks that Jim Cramer discusses. On Friday, Mad Money host, Jim Cramer, shared his perspective on how investors might approach the stock […]
